creditline: The Martha T. Wallace Memorial Fund, 1930
provenance: Erbach-Erbach family, Schloss Erbach Hofbibliothek, Erbach (Odenwald), Germany. F. H. Bresler Gallery, Milwaukee, Wisc.
text: Piranesi’s detailed studies of ancient Roman architecture sharpened his attention to building materials, such as the rivets in the huge center doors and the long, thin bricks of the arches on the second level.
title: The Staircase with Trophies
